import React from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps' export default function PlaceOrderScreen(props) { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart); if(!cart.paymentMethod){ props.history.push('/payment'); } const toPrice= (num) => Number(num.toFixed(2)); cart.itemsPrice = toPrice(cart.cartItems.reduce((a,c) => a+ c.qty * c.price , 0) ); cart.shippingPrice = cart.itemsPrice > 100? toPrice(0) :toPrice(7) ; cart.totalPrice = cart.itemsPrice + cart.shippingPrice ; const dispatch = useDispatch(); const placeOrderHandler = () => { dispatch(createOrder({cart})) } return (

  • Livraison

    Nom:{cart.shippingAddress.fullName}
    Adresse:{cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.city},{cart.shippingAddress.postalCode},{cart.shippingAddress.country}

  • Paiement

    Methode de paiement:{cart.paymentMethod}

  • Les articles à commander

      {cart.cartItems.map((item)=>(
    • {item.name}
      {item.qty} x {item.price}DT = {item.qty * item.price}DT
      • ))}

  • Prix total

  • Prix total des articles
    {cart.itemsPrice}DT
  • Prix de livraison
    {cart.shippingPrice}DT
  • Prix total
    {cart.totalPrice}DT
) }
